actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit the establishment and collection of any fee or charge for the issuance of certain entry level merchant seamen licenses and merchant mariners' documents, and for other purposes.
short_title: Maritime Academy Cadet Licensing Relief Act

summary.text: Maritime Academy Cadet Licensing Relief Act - Amends Federal law relating to Coast Guard user fees to prohibit any fee for the issuance, evaluation, or examination of, or applications for, entry level licenses or merchant mariner's documents for certain individuals under specified provisions.

titles.title: Maritime Academy Cadet Licensing Relief Act

To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit the establishment and collection of any fee or charge for the issuance of certain entry level merchant seamen licenses and merchant mariners' documents, and for other purposes.
